p: The chemical composition of the essential oil of the leaves of O. basilicum was carried out using GC-MS. The main constituents were identified by comparison of the mass spectrum of the compounds with the NIST 14 library spectra and by calculating the Kovats index for a series of saturated alkanes (C 7â€“C 30) (49451-U, 99.0%, Supelco, Bellefonte, PA, USA). Chromatographic analysis showed the presence of two major constituents in the basil EO ( Table 2). Estragole is the major compound, representing 85% of the identified compounds, followed by linalool at 12%, respectively ( Figure 6).
